text: Magnus Norman was the defending champion but lost in the semifinals to Bohdan Ulihrach. Andrea Gaudenzi won in the final 7-5, 6-3 against Ulihrach. ==Seeds== A champion seed is indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which that seed was eliminated. # Magnus Norman (Semifinals) # Dominik Hrbatý (First Round) # Albert Portas (Quarterfinals) # Andreas Vinciguerra (Second Round) # Bohdan Ulihrach (Final) # Michal Tabara (Quarterfinals) # Magnus Gustafsson (First Round) # Fernando Vicente (First Round) ==Draw== ==References== * 2001 Telenordia Swedish Open Draw Men's Singles Singles
title: 2001 Telenordia Swedish Open – Singles
